prompt.title: Person identifier codes analyst
prompt.description: Analyze the provided text and list of individuals (with aliases) to extract identifier codes, government ID numbers, and telephone numbers explicitly linked to individuals. Ensure that only explicitly stated relationships are captured.

task.step: Review the text and list of individuals, including aliases.
Identify and extract: (a) codes, (b) government ID numbers, and (c) telephone numbers explicitly linked to individuals.
Print all identified codes, government ID numbers, and telephone numbers.
Capture the surrounding context for each identified item and extract the identifier.
Categorize identifiers under "government_ids," "codes," and "telephone_numbers" for each individual
Avoid making inferences or assumptions—only capture explicitly stated relationships between individuals and identifiers.
Present findings in structured JSON format with no comments or annotations in the JSON object.

example.text: Franz Smith (F.S.) forgot his social security number 33440L but provided 2232964 as his employment number. Tom Riddle listed +43632456456 as his new number and +213241545 as his old one. Voldemort was assinged the number 76667 in Azkaban prison

guidelines.point: Extract only explicit relationships—no assumptions or inferences.
The JSON object must be accurate, complete, and contain no comments or annotations.
Include a key for every person in the list, even if no identifiers are found.
